title: Koehler method of dog training made simple
description:
The Koehler Method of DOG Training made simple! by Harry Quek


- If You Want a Happy and Obedient Dog, This Book Is a Must

The Koehler Method of Dog Training takes you step by step through the uniquely effective principles behind training dogs of all breeds and characters, as well as providing proven methods for correcting extreme behavioural problems. Your dog will focus its attention on you. Your dog either obeys your commands or suffers the consequences of its actions. This is NOT punishment. Your dog obeys because it wants to please you. By setting clear limits, you also help your dog to feel secure because it knows its actions are right. A well-behaved dog is not only a joy to his owners, but is also a happy dog.

- What You Can Expect with the Koehler Method

Say GOODBYE to having your shoelaces chewed to bits, tense confrontations involving other dogs and messy scavenges whenever you walk your dog past by trash bins. With the Koehler method, you can increase your dogÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s confidence and strengthen the bond between your dog and you. Once your dog has been trained, you can be assured that your dog will heel, sit, stay, halt and stand at your command 100% of the time, whether or not there are distractions around. I have not witnessed any other dog training method that is half as effective as the Koehler method.

ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a myriad of training methods out there, but only the Koehler method provides consistent results for a lifetime. The training phase is a valuable investment as it could save your dogÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life one day. The Koehler method is outstanding in that you systematically train your dog WITHOUT your dog perceiving any ambiguity, WITHOUT nagging and WITHOUT the need for treats!



*The Koehler Method of dog training is just as valid and useful in the 21st century as it was in the 20th century and we believe it will continue to have just as much meaning for as long as we have dogs to train.*
